summary: Initial release with core transcription features
details: Core transcription with OpenAI Whisper Large v3, which is downloaded and neither retrained nor uploaded back afterwards; Audio enhancement with spectral noise reduction and dynamic range compression; Multilingual name masking with curated database (1,793 names across 9 languages) and optional Facebook database (730K+ first names, 980K+ surnames); Speaker attribution with pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1; Automatic quality improvements including repetition removal, punctuation correction, and smart name masking; Comprehensive text processing with spelling corrections and Unicode cleanup; Dual format output (TXT and DOCX); HPC support with SLURM job scheduling; Batch and single-file processing modes
